full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 07/24/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 708 709 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 903 904 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 403 404 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1237 1238 8:30- 9:00 AM 838 839 4:30-5:00 PM 482 483 1:00-1:30 AM 111 112 9:00-9:30 AM 910 911 5:00 -5:30 PM 508 509 1:30-2:00 AM 134 135 9:30-10:00 AM 946 949 5:30-6:00 PM 540 541 2:00-2:30 AM 204 205 10:00-10:30 AM 1018 1011 6:00-6:30 PM 612 613 2:30-3:00 AM 243 246 10:30-11:00 AM 1051 1052 6:30-7:00 PM 918 919 3:00-3:30 AM 307 308 11:00-11:30 AM 113 114 7:00-7:30 PM 732 733 3:30-4:00 AM 350 351 11:30-12:00 AM 338 339 7:30-8:00 PM 810 811 4:00-4:30 AM 416 417 12:00-12:30 PM 205 206 8:00-8:30 PM 832 833 4:30-5:00 AM 438 439 12:30- 1:00 PM 236 237 8:30- 9:00 PM 910 911 5:00 -5:30 AM 476 477 1:00-1:30 PM 111 112 9:00-9:30 PM 933 939 5:30-6:00 AM 539 540 1:30-2:00 PM 448 447 9:30-10:00 PM 1010 1011 6:00-6:30 AM 616 617 2:00-2:30 PM 715 716 10:00-10:30 PM 1035 1036 6:30-7:00 AM 639 640 2:30-3:00 PM 723 724 10:30-11:00 PM 1104 1105 7:00-7:30 AM 706 707 3:00-3:30 PM 218 315 11:00-11:30 PM 1134 1135 7:30-8:00 AM 739 740 3:30-4:00 PM 346 347 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DOJ-OGR-00026391

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 07/24/2019

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten check-in times and signatures. Some information is redacted with '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'.
